Malta#Catholicism|Day of festa]] | blank1_info_sec1 = Sunday before November 25 | website = {{official website|http://www.taxbiex.com/}} | footnotes = }} '''Ta' Xbiex''' <ref>[http://www.fallingrain.com/world/MT/0/Ta_Xbiex.html Maps, Weather, and Airports for Ta' Xbiex, Malta<!-- Bot generated title -->]</ref> is a small town in southeastern [[Malta]] with a population of 1,846 (Nov 2005). It also has its own local council. [[File:Ta Xbiex Construction.JPG|thumb|right|Luxury apartment buildings under construction in Ta' Xbiex]] The town is home of a number of foreign embassies, including the Embassies of [[Egypt]], [[Italy]], [[France]], [[Austria]] and the [[British High Commission]]. The town also features a government housing estate and over the years it has also hosted a good amount of insurance companies, law firms and some IT and ship chandler service industries. It also services part of the Yacht Marina. Ta' Xbiex derives its name either from the name Tbexbix, meaning sunrise, (due to its geographical position) or else from the word Xbiek, meaning net, since this small town started off as a fishing village. It became a parish in 1969. The Parish [[Church (building)|Church]] dedicated to St [[John of the Cross]] is run by the Discalced Teresian [[Carmelite]] Monks. ==Ta' Xbiex Main Roads== *Triq Giuseppe Calì (Giuseppe Calì Street) *Triq Abate Rigord (Abate Rigord Street) *Triq Enrico Mizzi (Enrico Mizzi Street) *Triq il-Prinċipessa Margerita (Princess Margareth Street) *Triq il-Prinċipessa Eliżabetta (Princess Elizabeth Street) *Triq l-Ambaxxati (Embassy Way) *Triq San Ġwann tas-Salib (St. John of the Cross Street) *Triq Sir Ugo Mifsud (Sir Ugo Mifsud Street) *Triq Testaferrata (Testaferrata Street) *Rampa ta' Ta' Xbiex (Ta' Xbiex Terrace) *Vjal Sir Temi Zammit (Sir Temi Zammit Avenue) *Xatt Ta' Xbiex (Ta' Xbiex Coast Road) ==References== {{reflist}} ==External links== * [http://www.stjohnofthecross.net Ta' Xbiex St John of the Cross Parish Church] * [http://www.taxbiex.com Ta' Xbiex .com Guide to the city of Ta' Xbiex] * [http://www.taxbiex.gov.mt Ta' Xbiex Local Council] {{malta-LocalCouncils}} [[Category:Towns in Malta]] [[Category:Local councils of Malta]]
